text: Yamalheke nkakeewa nlhove nulhupalhe ukhuma wiirimu niiraka, â€œVano Nlhuku hoopolha attu awe, Nlhuku mwene ihu hooniha machiri awe, Ni Kuristo nthanlhe awe nowoohiha ikuru awe! Ukhalhawaya yoyo mmalhaponi aarelhe milhatu ashilhoko ihu wa Nlhuku uhiyu ni uthana uyo howonyeriya vathi vamoka ni akarumiya awe.
